A building shape that can have multiple sizes and floors

          Constructor for objects of class Buidling
 
Method Summary
 void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
          Draws the outline of the building as well its windows (either colored black or yellow, representing "lights turned off", or "lights turned on", respectively)

Constructor Detail

Building

public Building(double initBottomLeftX,
                double initBottomLeftY,
                int initHeight,
                int initWidth,
                int initNumFloors,
                int initWPF)
Constructor for objects of class Buidling

Parameters:
initBottomLeftX - The bottom left X coordinate of the gray outline of the building (Will be converted to upper left)
initBottomLeftY - The bottom left Y coordinate of the gray outline of the building (Will be converted to upper left)
initHeight - The height of the gray outline of the building
initWidth - The width of the gray outline of the building
initNumFloors - The amount of floors to be drawn into the outline object
initWPF - The amount of windows per floor to be drawn into the outline object
Method Detail

draw

public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
Draws the outline of the building as well its windows (either colored black or yellow, representing "lights turned off", or "lights turned on", respectively)
